user.title: Select Endpoint Type
user.description: Decide between the Cloud OpenAI or a custom LLM endpoint.

data.name: Name of your OpenAI Response Sensor
data.url: The base URL to the OpenAI compatible LLM. Eg. http://localhost:1234/v1

error.openai_auth: The OpenAI auth token is invalid.
error.custom_llm_auth: The custom LLM base URL is invalid.
error.insufficient_quota: You exceeded your current quota, please check your OpenAI plan and billing details.

data.persona: A short sentence that describes the persona (mood) of the OpenAI model.
data.keep_history: Disable this if you want a fresh response to each question. If enabled, the chat completion will try to answer your question in context of previous questions and answers.
data.temperature: Float value that ranges from 0 to 1. Higher numbers should cause more unique responses.
data.max_tokens: How many tokens to spend per response. Higher numbers might return longer and better responses.
